# borderColor(for:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the border color of the specified text block edge.

## Declaration

```swift
func borderColor(for edge: NSRectEdge) -> NSColor?
```

## Parameters

- **edge**: The edge of the text block in question.

## Return Value

The border color of the text block edge `edge`.

## Working with color

- **backgroundColor**: The background color of the text block.
- **setBorderColor(_:for:)**: Sets the border color of the specified edge of the text block.
- **setBorderColor(_:)**: Sets the color of all borders of the text block.
